tidyList.title: Calculate the number of difference days between two dates
tidyList.codebox:
from datetime import date
f_date = date(1996, 1, 27)
l_date = date(2020, 8, 5)
delta = l_date - f_date
print(delta.days)
#output:8957

tidyList.title: Calculate the number of difference months between two dates
tidyList.codebox:
from datetime import datetime
from dateutil import relativedelta
a = datetime(1985,1,1)
b = datetime(2000,1,28)
delta = relativedelta.relativedelta(b,a)
full_months = delta.years * 12 + delta.months
print(full_months)
#output:180

tidyList.title: Get the month name of a date
tidyList.codebox:
import calendar
import datetime
a = '2010-08-31'
datee = datetime.datetime.strptime(a, "%Y-%m-%d")
month_num = (datee.month)
month_abre = datetime.date(2015, month_num, 1).strftime('%b')
month_name = datetime.date(2015, month_num, 1).strftime('%B')
print("Short Name:", month_abre)
print("Full  Name:", month_name)

tidyList.title: #62 Sort list of dates given as strings
tidyList.codebox:
dates = ["23 Jun 2018", "2 Dec 2017", "11 Jun 2018",
        "01 Jan 2019", "10 Jul 2016", "01 Jan 2007"]
from datetime import datetime
for i in range(len(dates)):
	print(dates[i])
	dates.sort(key = lambda date: datetime.strptime(date, '%d %b %Y'))
# output: [23 Jun 2018, 10 Jul 2016, 2 Dec 2017, 11 Jun 2018, 23 Jun 2018, 01 Jan 2019]

tidyList.title: check if year is a leap year or not
Validate a gregorian date
tidyList.codebox:
import datetime
m = 13
d = 24
y = 1996
test = True
try:
    m, d, y = map(int, (m, d, y))
    datetime.date(y, m, d)
    test = True
except ValueError:
    test = False
print (test)
